name: Young Earth Road Trip
description:
Miguel is excited to learn about the new creationist museum, but is devastated to find out that local bus system doesn't travel there due to lack of demand. He decides to convert his neighbors so they can pilgrimage to the museum together. Young Earth Road Trip was made during the Ludum Dare 24 (Evolution) solo competition and won 3rd place in the humor category. The post-compo version features a soundtrack by Li'l Magic.

Features

  • Harass your neighbors
  • Pray for advice
  • Catch kittens
  • Dabble in the drug trade
  • Unarchived source code
